TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CompilerMarshalOverride extends System.Object
public ref class CompilerMarshalOverride abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示某個變數的修改執行個體 (Instance) 與封送處理 (Marshaling) 時的真正型別不同。

span.span: Indicates that the modified instance of a variable differs from its true type when marshaling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓 common language runtime 要封送處理 使用正確的大小。The class allows the common language runtime to marshal using the correct sizes. Common language runtime 的一些行為會與某些語言版本不相容。Some behaviors of the common language runtime are incompatible with some languages. 例如，c + + 視為布林值變數單一位元組值，而通用語言執行平台封送處理其值為四個位元組，以符合`BOOLEAN`Microsoft Win32 API 所定義的類型。For example, C++ treats Boolean variables as single-byte values, while the common language runtime marshals them as four-byte values to match the `BOOLEAN` type defined by the Microsoft Win32 API. 若要解決這類問題，c + + 編譯器會發出任何此修飾詞`wchar_t`或`bool`參數或函式傳回。To work around such issues, the C++ compiler emits this modifier on any `wchar_t` or `bool` parameter or function return.
